sentences.en: A dry - cell powered photographic apparatus that holds and electrically triggers a flashbulb.
sentences.cn: 闪光枪一种装有并以电引发闪光灯泡的用电池供电的照相器材.

sentences.en: A fine wire is heated electrically to incandescence in an electric lamp.
sentences.cn: 灯丝在电灯中电加时成白炽状态。

sentences.en: After development, the paths of electrically charged particles appeared.
sentences.cn: 显影以后, 就显示出带电粒子的径迹来.

sentences.en: An electrically heated septic tank has been developed.
sentences.cn: 曾设计了一种电热化尸池.

sentences.en: He was pacing as he talked, his lean clever face electrically alive.
sentences.cn: 他一面说一面来回走动, 聪明的瘦脸上神采焕发.

sentences.en: Rate gyros , like position gyros, can be blast started or electrically driven.
sentences.cn: 和定陀螺一样, 速度陀螺也可以采用瞬发式启动或电驱动.

sentences.en: That electrically charged particles reside within atoms had been surmised since the time of Faraday.
sentences.cn: 从法拉第的时代起,人们就已推测到,在原子内存在着带电的粒子.

sentences.en: The data interface is also electrically connected to the balance housing ( ground ).
sentences.cn: 数据接口同样与电子天平壳体 ( 地 ) 连接.

sentences.en: The electrically charged gas particles are affected by magnetic forces.
sentences.cn: 带电气体粒子会受磁力影响。

sentences.en: The ionosphere is that region of space contatining electrically charged species.
sentences.cn: 电离层是指含有带电物质的空间区域.

sentences.en: The pions form another triplet, electrically different but otherwise alike.
sentences.cn: π介子构成另一种三重态, 只是电荷不同,其它方面均相同.

sentences.en: The researchers stimulated the muscle electrically.
sentences.cn: 研究人员用电来刺激那块肌肉。

sentences.en: The term electronics refers to electrically-induced action.
sentences.cn: 电子学这个术语涉及电感作用。

sentences.en: The vibrations are amplified electrically and can be heard through loudspeakers in the operating room.
sentences.cn: 这种震动通过电流放大后,就可以从手术室的扩音器中收听到.

sentences.en: They will use almost any electrically controlled device to get your attention.
sentences.cn: 他们将使用几乎所有电子控制设备得到您的关心.

words.tran_cn: 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的
电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪
